title: Bob-omb

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - **Detonate**: Rampage attack a player, can only be used if Activated by an Atrribute.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are lynched, You may choose up to 2 players to kill, this ignores any form of defense.
- If you would die at night, you will instead be Activated and survive until the end of the next night, Can only be triggered once.
- You are immune to the attack reduction of not being the factional attacker.
- You can just deal a basic attack if you are the faction attacker.

desc:
Post 1571
*Bob-ombs are pretty temperamental, and they get steaming mad when you attack 'em.*
